explanation: [0-0] A man in a yellow shirt and blue pants is sitting on a rock, wearing brown shoes and smiling. Another man in a red shirt is kneeling in front of him, holding two brown shoelaces in his hands.

[0-6] Then, a hand wearing a black glove appears in the frame, holding a black marker pen, and starts drawing around the mouth of the man in the yellow shirt. The black marker pen extends a line segment from the mouth of the man in the yellow shirt and slowly draws the shape of an arm.
